name: Citor3 Santa's Elf VR Adult XXX Game
name_original: Citor3 Santa's Elf VR Adult XXX Game
description:
Santa has a naughty side to him as well? Don't believe us? Come see what Citor3 has in store with our first release of a Steam adult VR xxx game! It supports any type of tethered VR headset, so you're good to go immediately.

The game features:
* a VR POV experience
* motion controls interaction with the model
* luscious 3d modeling and textures
* body physics
* soundtrack
